name: International Conference on Neurology and Brain Disorders
content: Scisynopsis Group is organising and inviting you for the “International Conference on Neurology and Brain Disorders” at Paris, France on March 23-24, 2023\. The conference will enlighten the theme “Enlightening the New horizons in Neurology and Neuroscience”. Neurology conference 2023 heartily welcomes all the renowned neurologists, researchers, scientists, healthcare professionals, pharmacists, industrialists, clinicians and neurology experts to update their knowledge and treatments of these disorders. The conference have an elemental feature to the world distinguished motive speakers, plenary speeches, young Investigators & Researchers Forum, poster presentations, oral presentations and scientific sessions
